name: 10th Edition of International Conference on Otorhinolaryngology
content: 10th Edition of International Conference on Otorhinolaryngology Theme: Otorhinolaryngology and impact of COVID on ENT disorders Conference Brochure | Submit Abstract | Scientific Sessions Otorhinolaryngology team inviting the scientific community across the globe to attend the 10th Edition of International Conference on Otorhinolaryngology during November 22-23, 2021 at London, UK, with a motto to Explore Innovations in Otorhinolaryngology 2021\. The gathering will address sustainable developments in the area of Otology, Rhinology, Laryngology Research, while laying emphasis on innovative methodologies in otorhinolaryngology Research Trials. Otorhinolaryngology 2021 will be the best venue for academicians, researchers and interested parties to discuss proposals and advancements in Otology, rhinology, laryngology 2021 Conduct. Otorhinolaryngology 2021 Conference will encourage Young Researcher’s Forum, scientists and the researchers in their early stage of career graph to widely discuss their outcome so as to enrich and develop the idea. The ‘Best Poster Award’ is meant to encourage students in taking active part in the International Science platform to sharpen their skills and knowledgebase. The important tracks that are part of Otorhinolaryngology 2021 includes General Otolaryngology, Otology, Rhinology, Laryngology, Tongue-Speaking, Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA), Otorhinolaryngology, Audiology & Communication Disorders, Paediatric Otorhinolaryngology, Head And Neck Surgery, Otology, Neurology And Skull Based Surgery, Otorhinolaryngology And Oncology, Facial Plastic And Reconstructive Surgery, Biomaterials In Implant Otorhinolaryngology, Medical Otorhinolaryngology, Evidence-Based Clinical Practice In Otolaryngology, Bioethics In Otorhinolaryngology, ENT In Primary Care, Clinical Otorhinolaryngology, Recent Advances & Future Directions In Otorhinolaryngology, ENT Devices, Surgeries For Nasal Disorders, Endoscopic Surgeries, Ear Disorders Otorhinolaryngology 2021 is comprised of 20 designed to offer comprehensive sessions that address current issue. For more scientific sessions and abstract submission, please visit: https://otorhinolaryngology.euroscicon.com/abstract-submission For further details, please contact: Raquel Murillo| Conference Manager Otorhinolaryngology 2021 What’s App: +442039912223 E: ent.speakermeeting@gmail.com
